post.text: Sadly, the American dream is dead. But if I ever get elected president, I will bring it back, bigger and better than ever. â€¢DJT

comment.author: Ian
comment.text: We are sure going to vote for you,I cannot wait for you to be our President, and we will have respect from other Countries again.

replies.author: Steven
replies.text: They hate him and fearful if he should ever get in. Our country would be screwed

replies.author: Ian
replies.text: And you are not fearful now?

replies.author: Ian
replies.text: In case you havent seen it, we are already screwed.
